suite.name: MySql Tests

test.name: Test DB Connection

kw.name: Connect To Database Using Custom Params
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using the map string `db_custom_param_string`.
kw.msg: Executing : Connect To Database Using Custom Params : pymysql.connect(db_api_2.connect(database='rftutorial', user='rftutorial', password='Demoscript1!', host='localhost', port=3306))
OperationalError: (2003, "Can't connect to MySQL server on 'localhost' ([WinError 10061] No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it)")

test.status:
Setup failed: OperationalError: (2003, "Can't connect to MySQL server on 'localhost' ([WinError 10061] No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it)")
Also teardown failed: AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'close'
